Keycode Table

NIMH MonkeyLogic can log the states of key presses at milliseconds intervals. To record the key states to the data file, you need to put the codes of the keys in the Mouse/Key menu. Use the following table to find the key codes. For more information, see https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/desktop/inputdev/virtual-key-codes.
